==Description== ===Events=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Event !! Unlock Time !! Pokémon 1 !! Pokémon 2 !! Pokémon 3 !! Pokémon 4 !! Where to find event Pokémon |- | Flying Pikachu || July 6 - 12 || [[File:Flying Pikachu.png|50px]] Flying Pikachu || || || || |- | Armored Mewtwo || July 18 - 24 || [[File:Armored Mewtwo.png|50px]]Armored Mewtwo || [[File:Bulbasaur (Clone).png|50px]]Bulbasaur (Clone) || [[File:Charmander (Clone).png|50px]]Charmander (Clone) || [[File:Squirtle (Clone).png|50px]]Squirtle (Clone) || |- | Halloween || Oct 30 - Nov 5 || [[File:Spooky Bulbasaur.png|50px]]Spooky Bulbasaur || [[File:Spooky Togepi.png|70px]]Spooky Togepi || [[File:Pikachu (Gengar).png|50px]]Pikachu (Gengar) || Other Ghost Pokémon appear as well || Added to route Pokémon pools,
one per region for Kanto, Johto, and Hoenn |- | Lets GO! || Dec 14 - 21 || Special Eevee || Special Pikachu || - || - || Encounter special Eevee and Pikachu roaming in the [[Kanto]] region. |- | Christmas || Dec 24 - 30 || [[File:Santa Dragonite.png|50px]]Santa Dragonite || - || - || - || Roamer in Kanto, Johto, and Hoenn |} [[Category:Unique Pokémon]]
